properties.displayName: User account added to built in domain local or global group - [WC-BASE]
properties.description: Detects when a user account is added to a privileged built-in domain local, global, or universal group (e.g., Enterprise Admins, DnsAdmins, Cert Publishers). These groups grant elevated access across the environment and unauthorized additions may indicate privilege escalation. This detection excludes non-privileged groups like Remote Desktop Users.
